an5.157:4.1: “Pañcannaṃ, bhikkhave, puggalānaṃ kathā dukkathā puggale puggalaṃ upanidhāya.
an5.157:4.6: maccharissa cāgakathā dukkathā;
an5.157:5.1: Kasmā ca, bhikkhave, assaddhassa saddhākathā dukkathā?
an5.157:5.2: Assaddho, bhikkhave, saddhākathāya kacchamānāya abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patitthīyati kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
an5.157:5.4: Tañhi so, bhikkhave, saddhāsampadaṃ attani na samanupassati, na ca labhati tatonidānaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ.
an5.157:6.1: Kasmā ca, bhikkhave, dussīlassa sīlakathā dukkathā?
an5.157:6.2: Dussīlo, bhikkhave, sīlakathāya kacchamānāya abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patitthīyati kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
an5.157:6.4: Tañhi so, bhikkhave, sīlasampadaṃ attani na samanupassati na ca labhati tatonidānaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ.
an5.157:7.1: Kasmā ca, bhikkhave, appassutassa bāhusaccakathā dukkathā?
an5.157:7.2: Appassuto, bhikkhave, bāhusaccakathāya kacchamānāya abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patitthīyati kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
an5.157:7.4: Tañhi so, bhikkhave, sutasampadaṃ attani na samanupassati, na ca labhati tatonidānaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ.
an5.157:8.1: Kasmā ca, bhikkhave, maccharissa cāgakathā dukkathā?
an5.157:8.2: Maccharī, bhikkhave, cāgakathāya kacchamānāya abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patitthīyati kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
an5.157:8.4: Tañhi so, bhikkhave, cāgasampadaṃ attani na samanupassati na ca labhati tatonidānaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ.
an5.157:9.1: Kasmā ca, bhikkhave, duppaññassa paññākathā dukkathā?
an5.157:9.2: Duppañño, bhikkhave, paññākathāya kacchamānāya abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patitthīyati kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
an5.157:9.4: Tañhi so, bhikkhave, paññāsampadaṃ attani na samanupassati, na ca labhati tatonidānaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ.
an5.157:9.6: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṃ puggalānaṃ kathā dukkathā puggale puggalaṃ upanidhāya.
an5.157:10.1: Pañcannaṃ, bhikkhave, puggalānaṃ kathā sukathā puggale puggalaṃ upanidhāya.
an5.157:11.1: Kasmā ca, bhikkhave, saddhassa saddhākathā sukathā?
an5.157:11.2: Saddho, bhikkhave, saddhākathāya kacchamānāya nābhisajjati na kuppati na byāpajjati na patitthīyati na kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
an5.157:11.4: Tañhi so, bhikkhave, saddhāsampadaṃ attani samanupassati labhati ca tatonidānaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ.
an5.157:12.1: Kasmā ca, bhikkhave, sīlavato sīlakathā sukathā?
an5.157:12.2: Sīlavā, bhikkhave, sīlakathāya kacchamānāya nābhisajjati na kuppati na byāpajjati na patitthīyati na kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
an5.157:12.4: Tañhi so, bhikkhave, sīlasampadaṃ attani samanupassati, labhati ca tatonidānaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ.
an5.157:13.1: Kasmā ca, bhikkhave, bahussutassa bāhusaccakathā sukathā?
an5.157:13.2: Bahussuto, bhikkhave, bāhusaccakathāya kacchamānāya nābhisajjati na kuppati na byāpajjati na patitthīyati na kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
an5.157:13.4: Tañhi so, bhikkhave, sutasampadaṃ attani samanupassati, labhati ca tatonidānaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ.
an5.157:14.1: Kasmā ca, bhikkhave, cāgavato cāgakathā sukathā?
an5.157:14.2: Cāgavā, bhikkhave, cāgakathāya kacchamānāya nābhisajjati na kuppati na byāpajjati na patitthīyati na kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
an5.157:14.4: Tañhi so, bhikkhave, cāgasampadaṃ attani samanupassati, labhati ca tatonidānaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ.
an5.157:15.1: Kasmā ca, bhikkhave, paññavato paññākathā sukathā?
an5.157:15.2: Paññavā, bhikkhave, paññākathāya kacchamānāya nābhisajjati na kuppati na byāpajjati na patitthīyati na kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
an5.157:15.4: Tañhi so, bhikkhave, paññāsampadaṃ attani samanupassati labhati ca tatonidānaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ.
an5.157:15.6: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṃ puggalānaṃ kathā sukathā puggale puggalaṃ upanidhāyā”ti.
